articles.author: Anniek Bao
articles.title: Asia markets open mixed after Wall Street rally stalls; Bank of Korea rate decision in focus - CNBC
articles.description: The Bank of Korea surprised the market by cutting its benchmark interest rate by 25 basis points to 3.0%.
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets traded mixed on Thursday after Wall Street rally stalled overnight and as investors assessed a surprise interest rate cut by South Korea.
